description: Initial execution of malicious document calls wmic to execute the file with regsvr32 Author: Vadim Khrykov (ThreatIntel), Cyb3rEng (Rule). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Office Applications Spawning Wmi Cli
query: ((process.executable:"\\wbem\\WMIC.exe" OR process.command_line:*wmic\ * OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"wmic.exe" OR winlog.event_data.Description:"WMI\ Commandline\ Utility") AND process.parent.executable:(*winword.exe OR *excel.exe OR *powerpnt.exe))
